location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map of Iraq Showing the Oil Concessions of the Anglo Persian Oil Company (A.P.O.C.), the Iraq Petroleum Company (I.P.C.) and British Oil Development Company (B.O.D.) and Proposed Pipe Lines of the I.P.C.’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 172 x 279mm, on sheet 215 x 340mm

mods.abstract: The map shows oil concessions of the Anglo Persian Oil Company, the Iraq Petroleum Company, and the British Oil Development Company. It indicates proposed pipe lines of the Iraq Petroleum Company from Kirkuk to Haifa, and to Tripoli [in Lebanon] via Haditha. The map also indicates hydrology and railway lines.
